info.title: OPERA Cloud Room Configuration API
info.description:
APIs to cater for room configuration, such as configuring room types, room Classes, creating new room features, or updating housekeeping room maintenance reasons.

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 21.5.0.0.

This document and all content within is available under the Universal Permissive License v 1.0 (https://oss.oracle.com/licenses/upl). Copyright (c) 2020,2023 Oracle and/or its affiliates.

get.description:
Use this API to get Bed types.

OperationId:getBedTypes

parameters.name: fetchInactive
parameters.description: Determines wether to fetch inactive records or not.

parameters.name: codes
parameters.description: Codes to be searched.

parameters.name: wildCard
parameters.description: Wildcard search on the code.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the code.

200.description: Response object for fetching Bed Types.

get.description:
Use this API to get housekeeping room schedules.

OperationId:getHousekeepingRoomSchedules

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

200.description: Response object for fetching housekeeping tasks and housekeeping codes associated to a room type.

post.description:
Use this API to create housekeeping room schedules.

OperationId:postHousekeepingRoomSchedules

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: housekeepingRoomSchedulesCriteria
parameters.description: Request object for associating housekeeping tasks and housekeeping codes to a room type.

201.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

put.description:
Use this API to update housekeeping room schedules.

OperationId:changeHousekeepingRoomSchedules

parameters.name: roomScheduleId
parameters.description: Unique ID of room scheduled.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: housekeepingRoomSchedulesToBeChanged
parameters.description: Request object for changing housekeeping tasks and housekeeping codes associated to a room type.

200.description: Existing Operations Responses will eventually be modified to be extended from this type.

get.description:
Use this API to get Housekeeping Sections.

OperationId:getHousekeepingSections

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Indicates if the Section Code is active.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the Section.

200.description: Response object for fetching housekeeping section codes.

post.description:
Use this API to create Housekeeping Sections.

OperationId:postHousekeepingSections

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: housekeepingSectionsCriteria
parameters.description: Add housekeeping section codes configurations for resort.

201.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

delete.description:
Use this API to delete Housekeeping Sections.

OperationId:removeHousekeepingSections

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Unique Code of house keeping sections.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

200.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

put.description:
Use this API to update Housekeeping Sections.

OperationId:changeHousekeepingSections

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Unique Code of house keeping sections.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: housekeepingSectionsToBeChanged
parameters.description: Modify housekeeping section codes in resort configurations.

200.description: Existing Operations Responses will eventually be modified to be extended from this type.

get.description:
Use this API to get Hotel Room Maintenance Reasons.

OperationId:getHotelRoomMaintenanceReasons

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

parameters.name: roomMaintenanceReasonCodes
parameters.description: Codes to be searched.

parameters.name: wildCard
parameters.description: Wildcard search on the code.

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Inactive flag - whether or not to display inactive records

200.description: Response object for fetching room maintenance reasons for a hotel.

post.description:
Use this API to create Hotel Room Maintenance Reasons.

OperationId:postHotelRoomMaintenanceReasons

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: hotelRoomMaintenanceReasonsCriteria
parameters.description: Request object for creating new room maintenance reasons for a hotel.

201.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

put.description:
Use this API to update Hotel Room Maintenance Reasons.

OperationId:changeHotelRoomMaintenanceReasons

parameters.name: reasonCode
parameters.description: Unique Code of reason.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: hotelRoomMaintenanceReasonsToBeChanged
parameters.description: Request object for modifying room maintenance reasons for a hotel.

200.description: Existing Operations Responses will eventually be modified to be extended from this type.

delete.description:
Use this API to delete Hotel Room Maintenance Reasons.

OperationId:removeHotelRoomMaintenanceReasons

parameters.name: reasonCode
parameters.description: Unique Code of reason.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

200.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

delete.description:
Use this API to delete housekeeping room schedules.

OperationId:removeHousekeepingRoomSchedules

parameters.name: roomScheduleId
parameters.description: Unique ID of room scheduled.

parameters.name: roomTypeCode
parameters.description: Unique ID of room Type Code.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

200.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

get.description:
Fetch a properties Room Types. The request can be based on a properties Room class or Room Type. The operation returns a list of room types and a summary of the room types.

OperationId:getRoomTypes

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: accessible
parameters.description: Flag to indicate if accessible room type should be fetched.

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Flag to indicate if inactive room types should be included.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

parameters.name: physical
parameters.description: Is it a physical sleep room type.

parameters.name: pseudo
parameters.description: Is it a pseudo room type.

parameters.name: summaryInfo
parameters.description: Flag to indicate if summary or detailed information should be fetched.

200.description: Response object for Fetching existing Room Types.

post.description:
Use this API to create new room types for a property. A list of new room types can be passed as part of the request to Use this API to create multiple rooms in one request.

OperationId:postRoomTypes

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: roomTypesCriteria
parameters.description: Request object for Creating a new Room Type.

201.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

put.description:
Use this API to update a Room Type from a property. A list of room types that need to be modified can also passed as part of the request.

OperationId:putRoomTypes

parameters.name: roomTypeId
parameters.description: Unique ID of room types.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: roomTypesToBeChanged
parameters.description: Request object for Modifying Room Type.

200.description: Existing Operations Responses will eventually be modified to be extended from this type.

delete.description:
Use this API to delete a Room Type from a property.

OperationId:deleteRoomTypes

parameters.name: roomTypeId
parameters.description: Unique ID of room types.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: roomType
parameters.description: Used for codes in the OPERA Code tables. Possible values of this pattern are 1, 101, 101.EQP, or 101.EQP.X.

200.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

get.description:
Fetch rooms that exist for a specified property. The response will include a list of all existing rooms at that property.

OperationId:getRooms

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

parameters.name: physical
parameters.description: Is it a physical room type.

parameters.name: pseudo
parameters.description: Is it a pseudo room type.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: Room to be searched.

200.description: Response object for fetching complete information of existing rooms.

get.description:
This API accepts the room type template request search criteria and gets the Room Type templates.

OperationId:getRoomTypeTemplates

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Include inactive Room type in search result?

parameters.name: physical
parameters.description: Is it a physical sleep room type.

parameters.name: pseudo
parameters.description: Is it a pseudo room type.

200.description: Response object for information regarding room type template of a property.

post.description:
This API is used to Use this API to create new Room Type templates.

OperationId:postRoomTypeTemplates

parameters.name: roomTypeTemplatesCriteria
parameters.description: Request object for creating a new Room Type Template.

201.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

put.description:
This API is used to update a Room Type template. Use this API to updates can be made concurrently to multiple templates by passing Collection of Room Type templates with the new values.

OperationId:putRoomTypeTemplates

parameters.name: roomTypeTemplatesId
parameters.description: Unique ID of room type.

parameters.name: roomTypeTemplatesToBeChanged
parameters.description: Request object for Modifying existing Room Type Templates.

200.description: Existing Operations Responses will eventually be modified to be extended from this type.

delete.description:
Use this API to delete new Room Type templates.

OperationId:deleteRoomTypeTemplates

parameters.name: roomTypeTemplatesId
parameters.description: Unique ID of room type.

parameters.name: roomType
parameters.description: Used for codes in the OPERA Code tables. Possible values of this pattern are 1, 101, 101.EQP, or 101.EQP.X.

200.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

get.description:
Use this API to get template floors.

OperationId:getTemplateFloors

200.description: Response object for fetching floors at the template level.

Use this API to create template floors.

parameters.name: templateFloorsCriteria
parameters.description: Request object for creating floors at the template level.

201.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

Use this API to update template floors.

parameters.name: templateFloorsToBeChanged

200.description: Existing Operations Responses will eventually be modified to be extended from this type.

Use this API to delete template floors.

OperationId:removeTemplateFloors

parameters.name: templateFloorsId
parameters.description: Unique ID of template floors.

200.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

authKey.name: authorization
authKey.description: Bearer token that needs to be passed which is generated post user authentication

x-hotelid.name: x-hotelid
x-hotelid.description: Mandatory parameter to identify the hotel code where the end user is logged in

bedTypesDetails.description: Response object for fetching Bed Types.

translationTextType2000.description: Contains Multiple translated texts and language codes.

defaultText.description: Default text with Character length from 0 to 2000.

translatedTexts.description: List of translated text and language codes.

value.description: Used for Character Strings, length 0 to 2000.

instanceLink.description: Metadata describing link description objects that MAY appear in the JSON instance representation.

href.description: URI [RFC3986] or URI Template [RFC6570]. If the value is set to URI Template, then the "templated" property must be set to true.

rel.description: Name of the link relation that, in addition to the type property, can be used to retrieve link details. For example, href or profile.

templated.description: Boolean flag that specifies that "href" property is a URI or URI Template. If the property is a URI template, set this value to true. By default, this value is false.

method.description: HTTP method for requesting the target of the link.

targetSchema.description: Link to the metadata of the resource, such as JSON-schema, that describes the resource expected when dereferencing the target resource..

operationId.description: The operationId of the path you can call to follow this link.  This allows you to look up not only the path and method, but the description of that path and any parameters you need to supply.

title.description: Exact copy of the "summary" field on the linked operation.

warningsType.description: Used in conjunction with the Success element to define a business error.

warningType.description: Used when a message has been successfully processed to report any warnings or business errors that occurred.

shortText.description: An abbreviated version of the error in textual format.

code.description: If present, this refers to a table of coded values exchanged between applications to identify errors or warnings.

docURL.description: If present, this URL refers to an online description of the error that occurred.

status.description: If present, recommended values are those enumerated in the ErrorRS, (NotProcessed Incomplete Complete Unknown) however, the data type is designated as string data, recognizing that trading partners may identify additional status conditions not included in the enumeration.

tag.description: If present, this attribute may identify an unknown or misspelled tag that caused an error in processing. It is recommended that the Tag attribute use XPath notation to identify the location of a tag in the event that more than one tag of the same name is present in the document. Alternatively, the tag name alone can be used to identify missing data [Type=ReqFieldMissing].

recordId.description: If present, this attribute allows for batch processing and the identification of the record that failed amongst a group of records. This value may contain a concatenation of a unique failed transaction ID with specific record(s) associated with that transaction.

type.description: The Warning element MUST contain the Type attribute that uses a recommended set of values to indicate the warning type. The validating XSD can expect to accept values that it has NOT been explicitly coded for and process them by using Type ="Unknown".

rph.description: Reference Place Holder used as an index for this warning.

exceptionDetailType.title: Error Detail
exceptionDetailType.description: Complex type that contains error details for a REST call.

type.description: Absolute URI [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide a human-readable summary of the problem (for example, using HTML).

title.description: Short, human-readable summary of the problem.  The summary SHOULD NOT change for subsequent occurrences of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

status.description: HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem, set by the origin server.

detail.description: Human-readable description specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: Absolute URI that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.  It may or may not provide additional information if dereferenced.

o:errorCode.description: Application error code, which is different from HTTP error code.

o:errorPath.description: Path to the problem at the resource or property level.

o:errorDetails.description: Details of the error message, consisting of a hierarchical tree structure.

errorInstance.title: Error Instance Details
errorInstance.description: Complex type that contains error instance details for a REST call.

type.description: Absolute URI [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide a human-readable summary of the problem (for example, using HTML).

title.description: Short, human-readable summary of the problem.  The summary SHOULD NOT change for subsequent occurrences of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

status.description: HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem, set by the origin server.

detail.description: Human-readable description specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: Absolute URI that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.  It may or may not provide additional information if dereferenced.

o:errorCode.description: Application error code, which is different from HTTP error code.

o:errorPath.description: Path to the problem at the resource or property level.

housekeepingRoomSchedulesDetails.description: Response object for fetching housekeeping tasks and housekeeping codes associated to a room type.

housekeepingRoomSchedules.description: Collection of housekeeping tasks and housekeeping codes associated to a room type.

configHousekeepingRoomSchedulesType.description: This type holds a collection of housekeeping tasks attached to a room type.

configHousekeepingRoomScheduleType.description: Facility Housekeeping task code and description.

priority.description: Signifies the priority of the task.

credits.description: Housekeeping credits associated with this housekeeping task.

frequency.description: Signifies frequency(i.e. every 2 days) with which housekeeping task is to be performed.

frequencyDays.description: Specify how often in days following the guest's arrival date, the housekeeping task is to be completed.

specialRequests.description: Specify a particular Special code to associate to a housekeeping task code.

vIPStatuses.description: Specify a particular VIP code to associate to a housekeeping task code.

sequence.description: Used to store the housekeeping task sequence.

daysOfWeek.description: This option, if applied, works in conjunction with the Every XX Day(s) option to allow you to control the days of the week on which this housekeeping task can take place.

rateCodes.description: Specify one or more Rate Codes to associate to a specific housekeeping task code.

marketCodes.description: Specify one or more Market Codes to associate to a specific housekeeping task code.

cycleStartDay.description: Signifies offset(in days) i.e. start on 3rd day from arrival.

customizePromptText.description: The information that is entered into this text box.

taskSupplies.description: Collection of housekeeping task supplies for a room type.

roomType.description: Specifies the room type code with description.

guestRequested.description: Signifies whether housekeeping task is a guest requested task.

defaultDepartureTask.description: Signifies that task is a default task for the checked out room.

moveup.description: Automatically moves the task up one day if it falls on the day before the guests departure. It will only be available when the schedule is set to every 3 days or more.

hotelId.description: Specifies the hotel code that the room type belongs to.

frequencyTypeType.description: Simple type for storing frequency type.

timeSpanDaysOfWeekType.description: Container for Time span with days of week.

timeSpanType.description: Allows for a choice in description of the amount of time spanned by this type. EndDate specifies a specific date, while Duration provides a measure of time to add to the StartDate to yield end date.

configHousekeepingRoomScheduleTaskSuppli.description: This type holds a collection of housekeeping task supplies attached to a room type.

configHousekeepingRoomScheduleTaskSupply.description: Facility Housekeeping Code, its description and quantity.

sequence.description: Used to store the housekeeping room schedule sequence.

roomType.description: Specifies the room type code with description.

hotelId.description: Specifies the hotel code that the room type belongs to.

housekeepingRoomScheduleCode.description: Specifies the housekeeping room schedule code.

codeDescriptionType.description: This contains a generic code and description information.

housekeepingRoomSchedulesCriteria.description: Request object for associating housekeeping tasks and housekeeping codes to a room type.

housekeepingRoomSchedules.description: Collection containing details of housekeeping tasks and housekeeping codes to be associated to a room type.

status.description: Existing Operations Responses will eventually be modified to be extended from this type.

housekeepingRoomSchedulesToBeChanged.description: Request object for changing housekeeping tasks and housekeeping codes associated to a room type.

housekeepingRoomSchedules.description: Collection containing details of housekeeping tasks and housekeeping codes associated to a room type which have to be changed.

housekeepingSectionsDetails.description: Response object for fetching housekeeping section codes.

housekeepingSectionsType.description: List of the housekeeping sections to be configured or fetched

hotelId.description: Property where this section is defined.

targetCredits.description: Target Credit for each task sheet created for this section when auto task assignment is broken out by section.

rooms.description: Rooms count for this section code. This is auto populated while creating/fetching record.

roomCredits.description: Number of housekeeping credits. This is auto populated while creating/fetching record.

sequence.description: Display sequence when task assignment is automatically broken out by Section Group.

inactive.description: Indicates if the Section Code is active.

housekeepingSectionsCriteria.description: Add housekeeping section codes configurations for resort.

housekeepingSections.description: Add the housekeeping section code to the configuration of resort.

housekeepingSectionsToBeChanged.description: Modify housekeeping section codes in resort configurations.

housekeepingSections.description: The housekeeping section code to be modified in the configuration of the resort.

hotelRoomMaintenanceReasonsDetails.description: Response object for fetching room maintenance reasons for a hotel.

hotelRoomMaintenanceReasons.description: Collection of hotel level room maintenance reasons.

totalPages.description: Evaluated total page count based on the requested max fetch count.

offset.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

limit.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

hotelRoomMaintenanceReasonsType.description: Details for room maintenance reason at hotel level.

hotelRoomMaintenanceReasonType.description: Base common structure for Room Maintenance at both hotel and template levels.

code.description: Identification code for a particular room maintenance reason.

description.description: Description of a particular room maintenance reason.

sellSequence.description: Indicates the sell sequence for a particular room maintenance reason.

inactive.description: Inactive flag for a particular room maintenance reason.

hotelId.description: Hotel code that a particular room maintenance reason belongs to.

hotelRoomMaintenanceReasonsCriteria.description: Request object for creating new room maintenance reasons for a hotel.

hotelRoomMaintenanceReasons.description: Collection of hotel room maintenance reasons to be created.

hotelRoomMaintenanceReasonsToBeChanged.description: Request object for modifying room maintenance reasons for a hotel.

hotelRoomMaintenanceReasons.description: Collection of hotel room maintenance reason to be changed.

roomTypesDetails.description: Response object for Fetching existing Room Types.

roomTypesSummary.description: Contains the results of a successful operation.

roomTypes.description: Collection of Room Type Templates and their information.

totalPages.description: Evaluated total page count based on the requested max fetch count.

offset.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

limit.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

roomTypesSummaryType.description: This type holds collection of room type.

roomTypeSummaryType.description: This type represents the summary of room type attributes.

roomClass.description: Room class for the room type code.

activeDate.description: Active date of the room type.

pseudo.description: Indicates if room type is pseudo.

accessible.description: Indicates if room type is accessible.

sendToInterface.description: Indicates if room type is sent to interface.

suite.description: Indicates room type is a suite.

meetingRoom.description: Indicates room type is meeting room. This Can be Meeting room flag cannot be unmarked at the property level. Can only be marked for non pseudo room types.

numberOfRooms.description: Number of rooms for this room type.

inactive.description: Indicates the room type is inactive or not.

roomTypesType.description: This type holds collection of room type.

roomTypeType.description: This type represents the room type attributes.

newRoomType.description: New Room type code. (Used in change template room type operation)

roomClass.description: Room class for the room type code.

smokingPreference.description: Specifies the smoking preference for this room type. I.E. SM, NS.

activeDate.description: Active date of the room type.

pseudo.description: Indicates if room type is pseudo.

accessible.description: Indicates if room type is accessible.

suite.description: Indicates room type is a suite.

editable.description: Indicates if room type Room Components may be changed.

meetingRoom.description: Indicates room type is meeting room. This Can be Meeting room flag cannot be unmarked at the property level. Can only be marked for non pseudo room types.

sendToInterface.description: Indicates room type is sent to interface.

maintenance.description: Indicates room type is available for maintenance request.

defaultOccupancy.description: Default occupancy for the room type.

minimumOccupancy.description: Minimum occupancy for the room type.

maximumOccupancy.description: Maximum occupancy for the room type.

maxAdults.description: Maximum Adults for the room type.

maxChildren.description: Maximum Children for the room type.

houseKeeping.description: Room type shows in house keeping.

autoPopulate.description: Room type is automatically attached when new rate codes are created.

autoRoomAssign.description: Room number is automatically assigned when a reservation is made for this Room Type.

autoCheckin.description: Creates a new linked Reservation, and proceeds within check-in of the new reservation.

rateFloor.description: This value will control the minimum amount that the selected room type can be sold

yieldStatus.description: Specify whether the room type is yieldable or non-yieldable (Available when a yield integration add-on license is active.)

yieldCategory.description: Yield category for this room type (Available when a yield integration add-on license is active and when room type is Yieldable.)

numberOfRooms.description: Number of rooms for this room type.

roomTypeComponentsType.description: Contains room components of a component room type.

roomTypeComponentType.description: Room component and its quantity for the component room type.

qty.description: Quantity of room component for the component room type.

roomFeaturesType.description: A recurring element that identifies the room features.

code.description: A code representing a room feature.

description.description: A code representing a room feature.

roomTypeYieldableType.description: Simple type for Yieldable or Non Yieldable

roomTypesCriteria.description: Request object for Creating a new Room Type.

roomType.description: Room Type details to be created.

roomTypeDetails.description: Room Type details to be created.

codeType.description: Used for codes in the OPERA Code tables. Possible values of this pattern are 1, 101, 101.EQP, or 101.EQP.X.

roomTypesToBeChanged.description: Request object for Modifying Room Type.

roomType.description: Room Type details to be changed.

roomTypeDetails.description: Room Type details to be changed.

roomsDetails.description: Response object for fetching complete information of existing rooms.

rooms.description: Collection of rooms with detailed information.

configRoomsType.description: This type holds collection of rooms with complete information.

configRoomType.description: This type represents the primary room attributes.

roomType.description: Room type basic information of the room.

floorDescription.description: Description for the Floor of the Room.

roomDescription.description: Detail Long Description Of The Room.

smokingPreferenceDescription.description: This indicates the description of the room smoking preference.

roomAssignmentRating.description: Assignment Rating associated with the room.

accessible.description: Indicates whether the room is accessibility compliant.

meetingRoom.description: Indicates whether the room is a Meeting Room

rateCode.description: Published rate code of a room.

rateAmount.description: Published rate amount of a room.

ownerRoom.description: This indicates if room is marked as a owner room

unitGradeCode.description: The Unit Grade Code attached to the room

smoking.description: This indicates if smoking is allowed in the room.

turndownService.description: Turndown service flag of a room.

squareUnitsMeasurement.description: Square unit measurement of a room.

phoneNumber.description: Square unit measurement of a room.

housekeepingCredit.description: Housekeeping credits of the room. This may include stayover, departure, pickup and turndown credits.

roomSection.description: Room section of the room. This includes day and evening sections.

noOfBeds.description: Number of beds of the room.

pseudo.description: Indicates if room is a pseudo. This is read-only.

suite.description: Indicates if room is a suite. This is read-only.

roomClass.description: Room Class of the room. This is read-only.

houseKeeping.description: Indicates if room type of the room is flagged as housekeeping. This is read-only.

smokingPreference.description: Specifies the smoking preference for room type of the room.

roomAssignmentRating.description: Assignment Rating associated with the room.

minimumOccupancy.description: Minimum occupancy for the room type.

maximumOccupancy.description: Maximum occupancy for the room type.

accessible.description: Indicates if room type is accessible.

meetingRoom.description: Indicates whether function space can be meeting room.

roomComponentType.description: Room component and its quantity for the component room type.

qty.description: Quantity of room component for the component room type.

rooms.description: Collection of rooms assigned to the room type component.

roomRoomType.description: This type represents the primary room attributes.

roomType.description: Room type basic information of the room.

floorDescription.description: Description for the Floor of the Room.

roomDescription.description: Detail Long Description Of The Room.

smokingPreferenceDescription.description: This indicates the description of the room smoking preference.

roomAssignmentRating.description: Assignment Rating associated with the room.

accessible.description: Indicates whether the room is accessibility compliant.

meetingRoom.description: Indicates whether the room is a Meeting Room

roomCondition.description: Code and description of condition assigned on the room.

currencyAmountType.description: A monetary value expressed with a currency code.

currencyCode.description: Provides a currency code to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.

housekeepingCreditsType.description: Information regarding the credits for housekeeping tasks/rooms.

type.description: The Type of Credit. Example: TOTAL credits for the task sheet, total TRAVELLING credits for the task sheet.

numberOfCredits.description: Total number of Credits for the Type.

housekeepingCreditsDefinitionType.description: Type for the different kinds of Credits which will be used in Rooms Management.

roomPotentialsDetails.description: Response object for fetching Room Potentials.

inactive.description: Determines whether this code is inactive or not.

roomPotentialsCriteria.description: Request object for creating Room Potentials.

roomPotentialsToBeChanged.description: Request object for changing Room Potentials.

roomTypeTemplatesDetails.description: Response object for information regarding room type template of a property.

roomTypeTemplatesSummary.description: Contains the results of a successful operation.

roomTypeTemplates.description: Collection of Room Type Templates and their information.

totalPages.description: Evaluated total page count based on the requested max fetch count.

offset.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

limit.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

roomTypeTemplateSummaryType.description: This type holds collection of room type.

roomTypeTemplateType.description: This type holds collection of room type.

roomTypeTemplatesCriteria.description: Request object for creating a new Room Type Template.

roomTypeTemplate.description: Room Type template details to be created.

roomTypeTemplateDetails.description: Room Type template details to be created.

roomTypeTemplatesToBeChanged.description: Request object for Modifying existing Room Type Templates.

roomTypeTemplate.description: Room Type template details to be changed.

roomTypeTemplateDetails.description: Room Type template details to be changed.

templateFloorsDetails.description: Response object for fetching floors at the template level.

templateFloors.description: Collection of floors specified at the template level.

templateFloorsType.description: This type holds a collection of floors at the template level.

templateFloorType.description: Base details common between both template and hotel level floors.

housekeeping.description: Flag to indicate if this floor should be available on the Task Sheet Workflow configuration.

global.description: Specifies whether the floor is to be available for selection at all hotels.

templateFloorsCriteria.description: Request object for creating floors at the template level.

templateFloors.description: Collection containing details of floors specified at the template level which have to be created.

templateFloorsToBeChanged.description: Request object for changing floors at the template level.

templateFloors.description: Collection containing details of floors specified at the template level which have to be changed.

tags.name: ChainConfig
tags.description: The ChainConfigService Web Service offers capability of creating, managing, and retrieving of chain configuration.

tags.name: HotelConfig
tags.description: The Hotel Config Service Web Service offers capability to configure Master Data needed for Hotel Configuration such as managing Room Classes, Room Types, Rooms, etc.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Oracle Hospitality
